attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We would like the Prime Minster to sack this Member of Parliament for his deplorable attitude towards the public purse and tax payers monies.
His greed in this matter has been totally unacceptable.
He will not resign, he believes he is beyond the law, he needs to be sacked, publicly and now.

rejection.details: This petition cannot be acted upon as Elliot Morley was sacked from his Government role as climate change adviser on May 14.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
